statements: SELECT * FROM climate_data;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE precipitation < 5;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY precipitation DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE precipitation > 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT year, month, temperature, precipitation FROM climate_data;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT prediction_text, prediction_date FROM environmental_predictions WHERE prediction_id = 1;
SELECT month, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE precipitation > 50;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_text FROM environmental_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 100 ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT year, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM climate_data GROUP BY year ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT prediction_text, prediction_date FROM environmental_predictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM climate_data
SELECT year, month, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(precipitation) AS avg_precip FROM climate_data GROUP BY year, month ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT * FROM climate_patterns;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM climate_patterns WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM environmental_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type='Sensor';
SELECT source_id, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM climate_patterns WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'sensor' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description, predicted_impact FROM environmental_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) AND predicted_impact LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM climate_patterns WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM climate_patterns cp JOIN environmental_trends et ON cp.date = et.trend_id WHERE cp.temperature < 20 AND et.predicted_impact = 'significant';
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM weather_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT pattern_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT trend_name, prediction_date FROM environmental_trends ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, date FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60
SELECT event_name, location FROM weather_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT pattern_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_patterns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY end_date
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM environmental_trends WHERE prediction_date > '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM ClimateData;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_temperature, chance_of_rain FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE factor_value > 0.5;
SELECT trend_description, trend_value FROM HistoricalTrends WHERE trend_value < 10 ORDER BY trend_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 50.0
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_temperature, predicted_wind_speed FROM WeatherForecast WHERE predicted_temperature > 30.0 ORDER BY predicted_temperature DESC
SELECT factor_description, factor_value FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE factor_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY factor_value ASC
SELECT trend_description, trend_value FROM HistoricalTrends WHERE trend_value < 0 ORDER BY trend_value DESC
SELECT prediction_description, predicted_value FROM PredictedTrends WHERE prediction_id IN (1, 3, 5)
